metro.GameScreen.TrainView

Class TrainView

  • java.lang.Object
    • metro.GameScreen.GameScreen
      • metro.GameScreen.TrainView.TrainView

  • public class TrainView
extends GameScreen
    GameScreen with the default view. It Shows the trains, tracks, stations and basic player information.
    Author:
    Hauke
